transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji madam? 
Customer: Ha Manish sir good noon Anisha baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Actually aapka call aaya tha mere paas mein na to iski vajah se maine aapko call back kiya. Bataiye sir kya problem aa raha tha?
Customer: Vo madam mera jo location hai na bhilai.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: To usme na jaise bhilai dikha raha hai na madam to kya hai mera all over Chhattisgarh ka hai kaam.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: To jaise Chhattisgarh to dikha hi raha hai usme magar usme kya karna hai jaise bhilai dikha raha hai na to bhilai ke jagah na do cheez aur add karna hai madam.
Customer: Do cheez aur kya kya add honge?
Customer: Raipur aur Rajnandgaon.
Executive: Okay to ye matlab jo aap bata rahe ho vo address aapka GST mein already updated hai?
Customer: Ah GST mein madam actual mein Chhattisgarh ka hai pura GST number mera.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Hai na to vo kya hai ek jahan se mera company hai uska hai magar jo office jo office hai na mera ha ha vo kya hai teen jagaho pe hai abhi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha to to vo teeno aapko update karwane hai yaha pe?
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Theek hai to uska rent agreement hai na aapke paas mein?
Customer: To rent agreement aapko dena padega madam.
Executive: Ha rent agreement aap mujhe doge tabhi hum yaha pe update kar payenge.
Customer: Nahi to vo to sari jagah meri hai madam.
Executive: But hame to proof chahiye hota hai na. Hain?
Executive: Verification hoga to uske liye proof to chahiye padega na.
Customer: Nahi to madam zameen mera hai to usme kya cheez ka proof?
Executive: Sir acha matlab aapki khud ki hai vo?
Customer: Ha.

Executive: Ek minute line pe rahiye.

Executive: Sir aapke paas electricity bill hoga office ka?
Customer: Office ka electricity bill ha vo mil jayegi.
Executive: Ha to vo vo electricity bill aap mujhe provide kar do.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ha kyuki koi na koi document verification ke liye chahiye hota hai to ya to rent agreement hota rent pe hai nahi to fir aap electricity bill provide kar sakte ho to vo hum yaha pe address kar lenge.
Customer: Achcha aur jaise electricity bill nahi hogi to madam?
Executive: Agar bill nahi hoga to fir other document aap provide kar dena vaha pe ki vo zameen aapki hai.
Customer: Zameen ka paper bas hai madam mere paas.
Executive: Zameen ka paper ha vo ek baar main aapko confirm kar dungi main aapko ek baar rukiye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha ek minute rukiye bas.

Executive: Paper ka to mujhe sir idea nahi hai ek bari main confirm karke aapko batati hu team se theek hai agar other koi document hoga to vo aap provide kar dijiyega but electricity bill to hoga na sir agar aapka office vaha pe already hai.
Customer: Vo kya hai na madam dekho vo kya hai na gauram jaise nigam wala matlab vaha pe matlab office mein rehta hai ki gadiya bas khadi hoti hai meri hai na vaha mere ko bijli ki zarurat nahi lagti hai hai na matlab ek khula maidan hai ek khula maidan mein ek chabutara jaisa mera vo hai kya bolte hain jahan mein kursi laga ke baithta hu.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
Customer: Hai na mere koi vaha ladke baithte hain 10-12 log.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aisa type ka hai.
Executive: Theek hai main samajh gayi to fir usi ke basis pe aapko apna vo kar lekin sir yaha pe bhi na matlab document to chahiye hota hai kuch na kuch to main ek bari ye ha ye ek bari confirm kar leti hu agar vaha pe aapke property wale paper agar attach ho sakte hain to fir vo attach karwa ke hum update karwa denge theek hai.
Executive: Aur maine maine aapko na whatsapp pe hi ka message send kiya hai aap ek baar ek baar check karna aur aapke paas mera number personal wala save nahi hai kya sir?
Customer: Nahi madam maine phone kiya tha magar aapka number out of area dikha raha tha.
Executive: Achcha achcha abhi ye whatsapp wala jo number hai na isko aap save kar lijiye ek baar check karega aapko whatsapp pe message receive hua hai?
Customer: Ha ye aa gaya hai aapka message.
Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe revert back kar do aur main do minute mein abhi team se confirm karke aapko confirm karti hu ki kya hum kuch kar
Customer: Number nahi manga theek hai to fir kyuki electricity bill bhi nahi hai na aapke paas mein confirm hai.
Customer: Sirf zameen ka paper hai madam mere paas.
Executive: Ha paper ke liye main ek baar discuss kar leti hu requirement ho sakti hogi to fir vaha pe karwa denge aapko.
Executive: Theek hai aur main aapka concern aapne 96 pe call kiya hua tha to main aapka concern close kar de rahi hu isko leke to aap please usme feedback ek baar de dijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Ha aapko message receive ho jayega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to update location: Raipur and Rajnandgaon.

- Does not have rent agreement or electricity bill.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for electricity bill for verification.

- Executive will confirm if land papers are sufficient.

- Executive closed the customer's concern.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm with team about land papers.

- Customer to provide documents if required.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- location update, documents, verification, electricity bill
